text: Truth makes on the ocean of nature no one track of light every eye, looking on, finds its own.
author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

text: America is still mostly xenophobic and racist. That's the nature of America, I think.
author: Jerry Garcia

text: Great art picks up where nature ends.
author: Marc Chagall

text: Married love between man and woman is bigger than oaths guarded by right of nature.
author: Aeschylus

text: Another thing I like to do is sit back and take in nature. To look at the birds, listen to their singing, go hiking, camping and jogging and running, walking along the beach, playing games and sometimes being alone with the great outdoors. It's very special to me.
author: Larry Wilcox
